purgeAmount.description: Default amount of messages to purge when no number is given.

muteTime.description: Default time to mute user (in minutes) when no number is given.

banTime.description: Default time to ban a user when no number is given. [WIP]

enable.description: Defines if Shooting Star should celebrate birthdays or not! Disabling this also disables the commands linked to birthday!

channel.description: Defines the channel in which Shooting Star should wish happy BDay. Setting this to null disables all bday wishes and make ponies sad :c

enable.description: Defines if Shooting Star should gib mangoes to pones!

channel.description: Defines the channel in which Shooting Star will announce when new mangoes arrive!

limit.description: Defines how many mangoes can a user take per day. Sharing is caring, after all!

roles.description: List of roles to give a user when they join the server.

channel.description: Channel in which the welcoming message is going to be written. (if enabled)

message.description: Message to be displayed on member join. If null, no message will be sent.

channel.description: Channel in which the logs will be output. Should usually be in a private channel, as those contain administrative actions

memberJoin.description: Set to true if logs should output new members in the server, otherwise set to false.

memberUpdate.description: Set to true if logs should output members updates in the server, otherwise set to false.

memberLeave.description: Set to true if logs should output members leaving the server, otherwise set to false.

modActions.description: Set to true if logs should output mod actions (warns, mutes, kicks, bans), otherwise set to false.

errors.description: If things don't work out, this will be the channel where errors will be printed!

member.description: Role given to members. Useful to let them use commands

staff.description: Role given to staff. Useful to let them use commands

trialstaff.description: Role given to trial staff. Useful to let them use commands

admin.description: Role given to admin. Useful to let them use commands

owner.description: User ID of owner. Useful to let them use commands

muted.description: Role to give a user to have them muted. This will not remove the 'member' role, you'll need to take care of permissions yourself.

dmOnAction.description: Set to true if mod actions should send a DM to the offender, otherwise set to false

lockdownMode.description: Set to true to activate lockdown mode (also can be done with !lockdown): all new members will need to manually have the member role given to them to access the server.

channel.description: Channel ID of the streamer used for twitch-related commands.

maxLimit.description: Maximum amount of stream to display when calling Schedule command. Must be between 1 - 25.

perWeek.description: Displays only the schedule of this week. Can override maxLimit depending of amount of streams.

automaticStatus.description: Defines if status should be automatically handled by the bot, showing next stream date.
